list.name: Changes
list.comment:
- Centered the text element for

in the header

component.name: FlaskConsoleOptions
component.custom-start-script: import sys sys.path.extend([WORKING_DIR_AND_PYTHON_PATHS]) from flask.cli import ScriptInfo locals().update(ScriptInfo(create_app=None).load_app().make_shell_context()) print("Python %s on %s\nApp: %s [%s]\nInstance: %s" % (sys.version, sys.platform, app.import_name, app.env, app.instance_path))

option.name: myCustomStartScript
option.value: import sys sys.path.extend([WORKING_DIR_AND_PYTHON_PATHS]) from flask.cli import ScriptInfo locals().update(ScriptInfo(create_app=None).load_app().make_shell_context()) print("Python %s on %s\nApp: %s [%s]\nInstance: %s" % (sys.version, sys.platform, app.import_name, app.env, app.instance_path))

task.summary: Updated color scheme, and contact functionality
Updated color scheme, and contact functionality
Updated Home intro, music page, soundcloud playlist
Added a canvas and interactive background to the music page
Added a canvas and interactive background to the music page
Added the href for my soundcloud account
Added slide-container for videos on music.html

Integrate interactive background with SoundCloud and YouTube players
- Updated YouTubeInteractiveBackground.js: - Added event listener for SoundCloud state changes - Implemented start() and stop() methods for better control - Refactored to respond to both YouTube and SoundCloud events
- Modified music.html: - Added dispatch of 'soundCloudStateChange' events in initializeSoundCloudWidget() - Updated onPlayerStateChange() to consistently dispatch 'videoStateChange' events - Ensured background animation starts/stops for both platforms
- Improved user experience with synchronized visual effects across media types - Fixed issue where background wasn't responding to SoundCloud playback

Implement YouTube video slider on music page
- Add JavaScript for slider navigation - Integrate with existing YouTube and SoundCloud functionality - Improve user experience for browsing video content

Improve interactive background and media playback
- Enhance YouTube and SoundCloud integration - Refine background animation control - Fix state management issues - Optimize code structure and improve debugging

Refined SoundCloud icon for cyberpunk theme:
1. SVG Changes: - Created a custom stylized waveform with varying heights - Added an animated curved line at the bottom - Incorporated horizontal grid lines for a tech-inspired look
2. CSS Updates: - Implemented a neon glow effect using drop-shadow filter - Added draw animation for the bottom curve - Created a flickering animation for horizontal lines - Updated hover effects to change color and glow intensity
3. Aesthetic Improvements: - Enhanced visibility while maintaining brand recognition - Better integration with the site's cyberpunk theme - Improved consistency with other social icons
4. Responsiveness: - Ensured icon remains clear and distinctive at smaller sizes
These changes create a more dynamic, futuristic SoundCloud icon that aligns with the overall cyberpunk aesthetic of the site.

Update navigation bar and styling
- Added social media links to the navigation bar - Redesigned nav bar layout for better integration of social icons - Updated style.css to accommodate new nav bar design - Improved responsiveness for smaller screens - Maintained cyberpunk theme with neon effects on social icons - Removed social links from footer - Minor adjustments to header and overall layout for consistency. These changes enhance the site's navigation by making social media links more prominent and accessible. The updated design maintains the site's cyberpunk aesthetic while improving overall user experience and responsive behavior. - Lastly Deleted the Send Message Section of the contact.html and app.py

- Centered the text element for

in the header
